reviewText:
This is a compilation of all of the cutscenes in the game itself, and there are even bits of gameplay in it. I love the game, so I'm really happy with it. I can watch the cutscenes now without having to play through the game if I don't want to.

I would honestly not recommend this product for someone wanting to watch an actual Bayonetta anime, because this is not what the product actually is. However, if you are a fan of the game, go for it. My only complaint is that it's not worth the price it costs, and I've found several sites where I could have gotten it for a much more reasonable price. I will say, though, that I bought it from this seller because of his assurance that if it didn't work in my dvd player, he'd let me return it.
